burtis.modules.simulation.models

Class Bus

  • java.lang.Object
    • burtis.modules.simulation.models.Bus

  • public class Bus
extends java.lang.Object
    Bus representation in simulation module.
    Author:
    Mikołaj Sowiński

    • Field Detail

      • busManager

        private final BusManager busManager
        Reference to the bus manager.

      • busSpeed

        private final int busSpeed
        Bus speed (units/iteration).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • busStopManager

        private final BusStopManager busStopManager
        Reference to the bus stop manger.

      • busStopQueryRequest

        private BusStop busStopQueryRequest
        If bus awaits result of a query this value is not null and is set to the BusStop object to be queried.

      • currentBusStop

        private BusStop currentBusStop
        Bus stop bus is currently enqueued to. This value is null when bus is in RUNNING state.

      • cycle

        private int cycle
        Number of full line cycles.

      • goToDepot

        private boolean goToDepot
        Determines if bus should be moved to the depot after arriving to the terminus.

      • id

        private final int id
        Bus id.

      • logger

        private final java.util.logging.Logger logger
        Bus logger.

      • maxCycles

        private final int maxCycles
        Number of cycles to be done by default before moving to the depot.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • nearestBusStop

        private BusStop nearestBusStop
        Next bus stop on the line.

      • numberOfPassengers

        private int numberOfPassengers
        Number of passengers in the bus.

      • position

        private int position
        Current bus position in units.

      • queryResult

        private boolean queryResult
        Result of the query determining whether anyone is waiting at the bus stop. This value is set after receiving response from Passengers module.

      • requestedBusStop

        private BusStop requestedBusStop
        Next bus stop defined by passenger's request. This value can be null (if there is no passenger in the bus).

      • state

        private Bus.State state
        Current bus state.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bus

        public Bus(BusStopManager busStopManager,
           BusManager busManager,
           java.util.logging.Logger logger)
        Creates new bus with next unique generated ID in Bus.State.DEPOT on position 0.
        Parameters:
        busStopManager - - Manager of bus stops.
        busManager - - Manager of buses.
        logger - - logger to be used.

    • Method Detail

      • arrive

        public void arrive()
        Function that makes bus arrived to the nearest bus stop. Bus position is set to the bus stop's position (initially it can be larger), bus state is changed and currentBusStop is set appropriately.

      • arriveAtTerminus

        public void arriveAtTerminus()
        Function that makes bus arrived to the terminus. Sets currentBusStop to the terminus (nearestBusStop) and sets bus state to TERMINUS. If maximum number of cycles is reached bus is reached goToDepot is set true.

      • depart

        public void depart(java.lang.String requestedBusStopName)
            throws NoSuchBusStopException
        Function that orders bus depart from the bus stop. It sets nextBusStop to the one given as an argument and calls BusStopManager.getNextBusStop(BusStop) to set nearestBusStop value.
        Parameters:
        requestedBusStopName - name of bus stop requested by passenger, can be null
        Throws:
        NoSuchBusStopException - if current bus stop does not exist

      • getBusStopQueryRequest

        public BusStop getBusStopQueryRequest()

      • getClosestBusStop

        public BusStop getClosestBusStop()

      • getCurrentBusStop

        public BusStop getCurrentBusStop()

      • getFreePlaces

        public int getFreePlaces()
        Get number of free places in the bus.
        Returns:
        number of free places

      • getId

        public int getId()

      • getNextBusStop

        public BusStop getNextBusStop()

      • getNumberOfPassengers

        public int getNumberOfPassengers()

      • getPosition

        public int getPosition()

      • getState

        public Bus.State getState()

      • getStateString

        public java.lang.String getStateString()
        Returns:
        string containing bus id, its position and state.

      • isGoToDepot

        public boolean isGoToDepot()

      • omitBusStop

        public void omitBusStop()
                 throws NoSuchBusStopException
        Function that makes bus omit nearest bus stop.
        Throws:
        NoSuchBusStopException - if nearest bus stop does not exist

      • processQueryResult

        public void processQueryResult()
                        throws NoSuchBusStopException
        Processes query (waiting passengers at bus stop) result. If anyone is waiting calls arrive(), if not, calls omitBusStop(). Executes only in running state.
        Throws:
        NoSuchBusStopException - if current bus stop does not exist

      • sendFromDepot

        public void sendFromDepot()
        Sets bus to start at next iteration after arriving from the depot. It means reset of cycle count and position as well as setting nearest bus stop to the first bus stop in the line.

      • sendFromTerminus

        public void sendFromTerminus()
        Sets bus to start at next iteration after being at the terminus. It means increasing of cycle count, resetting position as well as setting nearest bus stop to the first bus stop in the line.

      • setClosestBusStop

        public void setClosestBusStop(BusStop closestBusStop)

      • setGoToDepot

        public void setGoToDepot(boolean goToDepot)

      • setNextBusStop

        public void setNextBusStop(BusStop nextBusStop)

      • setNumberOfPassengers

        public void setNumberOfPassengers(int numberOfPassengers)

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(int position)

      • setQueryResult

        public void setQueryResult(boolean queryResult)

      • setState

        public void setState(Bus.State state)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • updateBusPosition

        public void updateBusPosition()
                       throws NoSuchBusStopException
        Updates bus position and checks bus stop interaction. If bus reaches bus stop and no one ordered stopping there, query is requested to determine if stopping here is necessary.
        Throws:
        NoSuchBusStopException - if one of the bus stops involved does not exist
